500.title: $t(error:500.heading) - $t(app:serviceName)
500.heading: Something’s gone wrong
500.body: The service is temporarily unavailable. Try again later.

404.title: $t(error:404.heading) - $t(app:serviceName)
404.heading: Page not found
404.body: If you entered a web address, check it was correct.

403.title: $t(error:403.heading) - $t(app:serviceName)
403.heading: You’ll need to start again
403.body: Because you have not entered any details for the last 20 minutes, your session has been closed. This helps to keep a claimant’s information as secure as possible.

401.title: $t(error:401.heading) - $t(app:serviceName)
401.heading: Unauthorised
401.body: You are not authorised to access this service.
